Text:
Is this the Bluray version? I ask because this does not contain any subtitles and I recall the HDTV rips not having subtitles neither. 

If possible this should be seeded again with subtitles. The new scene with Han Solo talking to Jabba the Hut is a bit meaningless without the subtitles. Jabba speaks an alien language and with no subtitles it's impossible to know what he's saying.

The subtitle is here:

http://subscene.com/english/star-wars-episode-iv--a-new-hope/subtitle-475475.aspx

You can add it to the file by downloading MKVtoolnix 4:

http://www.afterdawn.com/software/audio_video/video_editing/mkvtoolnix.cfm/v2_8_0

Use MKVtoolnix to make a new MKV file - it takes about 1 to 2 mins to do with the subtitle added. :)
